class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        graph = list(range(-1, n - 1))
        graph[0] = None
        # ds = list(range(n))[::-1]

        ans = []
        rem = set()
        for a, b in queries:
            if a in rem or b in rem:
                ans.append(n - len(rem)-1)
                continue
            c = graph[b]
            while c != a:
                rem.add(c)
                c = graph[c]
            graph[b] = a
            ans.append(n - len(rem)-1)

        return ans
